**"Ritual for the Ninth and Tenth Recitations of the *Jinlu* Ten-Cycle *Duguren* (Degree of Saving Beings) Evening Scripture Rotation**

**Preface to the Hall of the Master**

**High Functionary Kneeling and Reporting:**

Your devoted disciple, [Name], respectfully petitions the **Venerable True Lord of the *Lingbao* Mystic Middle Dao**, the **Lord of the *Lingbao* Scripture Master**, the **Lord of the Register Master**, the **Lord of the Degree Master**, the **Lord of the Celestial One Master**, the **Lord of the Female Master, Successor Master, and System Master**, the **Venerable True Lord of the *Lingbao* Supervising Fasting Master**, and the **One Who Shakes the Lineage—Lord of the *Chiming* Diagram and *Shu Zhu* Transmission**.

With deepest reverence, I humbly await Your Benevolent Guidance and Your Piercing Insight.

I have heard that the *Lingbao* Original Chapter encompasses the hidden melodies of a hundred demons, while the **Supreme Grade of Marvelous Initiation** unfolds the tenfold transformations of the Mystic Work. Now, this ritual is once again performed in the scriptural rites, relying entirely on Your Master’s creation.

Today, with sincere devotion, I lead the assembled officials in ascending the platform to recite the *Taishang Dongxuan Lingbao Wuliang Duguren Shangpin Miaojing* (The *Supreme Venerable’s Mystic Treasure Sutra of Infinite Salvation: Supreme Grade of Marvelous Initiation) from the **ninth to the tenth cycle**, in solemn prayer for the **Ten Thousand Years of Longevity** and the **Eternal Preservation of Heaven**.

All depends on Your Benevolent Oversight, presiding over this sacred assembly.

May the resonance pierce the **Three Heavens**, and the sound reach the **Nine Realms**."

「All beings share in the universal benefit. We await Your Benevolent Command and solemnly recite the scriptural rites. With deepest reverence, we dare not presume upon Your Master’s severity, nor can our humble prayers be adequately expressed.

We lead the assembled multitude to ascend the platform and respectfully perform the prescribed rituals. We chant the **Dao**, and guide the congregation to stand before the altar in order. Then, in sequence, we ascend the platform, offer incense, and each pay homage with sincere devotion to Your Master’s presence as per the ritual.

With **jade voice** capturing the **qi**, and **mystic wind** gathering the smoke, the **purple void** flourishes in splendor, aiding and supporting the **Ten Thousand Celestial Immortals**. In perfect harmony and unity, the ritual naturally attains its true essence. We strike the **law-drum** twenty-four times.

**The Supreme Dao/Way of the Primordial Origin, the Venerable Lord of the Supreme Grade, the Natural and Spontaneous Lord of the Beginning of the Dao/Way, the Supreme Lord of the Mystic Treasure and the Way of Marvelous Initiation, the Supreme Lord of the Miraculous and Manifest, the Lord of the Old Master of the **Primordial Chaos** and **Dao/Way of Transformation, the Jade Emperor of the Broad Heaven, the Benevolent Father of the Primordial Yang, the Jade Mother of the Mystic Treasure, the Celestial Sovereign of the Southern Pole, the Great Purple Emperor of the Northern Pole, the Lord of the Vermilion Mound who governs lifespan, the Earthly Sovereign of the Rear Soil, the Supreme Lord of the Mystic Treasure of the Ten Directions, the **Ten Thousand Years of Longevity** and the **Eternal Preservation of Heaven**—the **Ten Thousand Celestial Immortals** of the **Supreme Grade**, the **Supreme Saints** who have attained the Dao/Way, and all the Venerable Lords—**

**The Thirty-two Celestial Emperors of the Eastern Marvels, Southern Pole, Western Spirits, and Northern True Purities; the **Supreme Lord of the Golden Gate** and **Seven Treasures** in the **Jade Pivot Palace** of the **Purple Void Upper Court** of the Mystic Treasure, the **Supreme High Official** and **Supreme Grand Vizier**, the **Supreme Protector** and **Supreme Tutor**, the **Supreme High Lord of the Mystic Center**, the **Thirty-six Imperial Scriptures**, the **Supreme Grand Master** of the Mystic Center, the **Five Emperors** and **Three Officials**, the **Four Ministers** and **Nine Departments**, the **Sun, Moon, and Five Stars**, the **Southern Celestial Axis** and **Northern Dipper**, the **Twenty-eight Constellations**, the **Ruler of the **Xuanji** and **Jade Balance**, the **Celestial Immortals of the Stars and Symbols**, the **Ten Directions’ Supreme Saints of the Dao/Way**, the **Long-Lived, Boundless Degree of Salvation Lord of the Flying Celestial Ones**, the **Celestial Man of the Dao/Way** and the **Miraculous True Person of the Way**, the **Three Mystic Treasures**, the **Supreme Master of the Ritual Fast**, the **Five Emperors Attending the Scriptures**, the **Jade Boys and Jade Girls**, the **Jade Gentleman of the Scriptures**, the **Three Dao/Way Attendants of the Scriptures**, the **Mystic Treasure Officials**, the **Five Emperors of the Three Realms**, the **Great Magical King**, the **Three Realms’ Officials**, and all the **Responsive True Spirits**—**

We humbly gaze upon Your **Great Benevolence**, awaiting Your **Divine Discernment**. We have heard that the **emptiness and dharma** coalesce into sacred texts, though they transcend the **hidden and revealed** cycles of the **Dragon-Kang Effort***; and the **law-wheel** reveals its mysteries, encompassing the **universal harmonizing** of all existence.

Now, as we recite with our mouths and contemplate with our hearts, Your mercy surely extends to every utterance and response.

We, Your humble servants, **某** (name), are unworthy and insignificant. Yet, by the fortunate encounter of **karmic circumstances**, we have seized this opportunity to expound the scriptures.

On this auspicious night, we complete the **ritual cycles** once more. The division of **yin** and **yang**, the reckoning of numbers, has reached its fullness in the **odd and even pairs**; the **high and low**, the **vast and profound**, have been thoroughly illuminated by Your **Benevolent Grace**.

With deepest reverence, we prostrate ourselves and take refuge in the **Supreme Dao/Way of the Boundless**. With utmost sincerity, we take refuge in the **Ten Directions’ Scriptural Treasures**, praying that all beings may open their hearts to enlightenment and uphold, recite, and study these teachings.

With utmost sincerity, we take refuge in the **Ten Directions’ Dao/Way Treasures**, praying that all beings may turn their minds to **devotion** and render **sincere homage** to all.

With utmost sincerity, we take refuge in the **Ten Directions’ Master Treasures**, praying that all beings may ascend the **law-path** universally, encountering no obstacles.

**Praise of Past Lives**
We solemnly recite the scriptures: the **ninth cycle** opens the ritual rites. We sit in contemplation, reciting the **seated hymns**, and focus our minds as per the **law**.」

**Opening the Scriptural Mysteries and Turning the Dharma Wheel**

**Chant of the Opening Invocation**
*"Request the turning of the Dharma Wheel"*
**The Master Inscribes the Sutra**
*"Completion of the Recitation"*
**Hymn of the Dispersed Assembly**
*"Attending the Sutra’s Devotion"*
**Ode of Wisdom and Grace**

**The Master and the Ritual Officials Return to the Upper Realm**
*They offer incense and bow twice.*

With humble reverence, we present this **void-permeating, luminous verse**—
Crafted into **Nine Transformations**,
Its **cloud-borne resonance** piercing the **Ten Directions**.

With profound reverence, we honor the **Supreme Celestial Sovereign of the Boundless Dao/Way** in the Upper Realm,
The **Long-Living Great Sage, the Flight-Heaven Deva King of Infinite Salvation**.

Seated upon the **Circular Luo**, His **merits cover all**—
His **jewel-like brilliance** lets Him hear the **Golden Mouth’s exposition**,
His **lofty cloud-canopy** ever attends the **Jade Capital’s governance**.

We humbly pray for His **radiant descent** and **command of restorative power**—
May **yin-yang, cold-heat** find their balance, **no creature suffer blemish or plague**,
May the **sun, moon, and stars** shine in their proper order, **the land abound in auspicious omens**.

With **manifest decrees** in hand, we now **solemnly proclaim**.

**Proclamation of the Decree**
*Burning the Offering*

*"Attending the Sutra’s Proclamation,"*
**The Tenth Cycle Opens the Ritual Rites**
**Hymn of the Dispersed Assembly**
*"Request the Turning of the Dharma Wheel"*
**The Master Lifts the Sutra**
*"Hold the Thought as Initially Directed"*

The Dao speaks: *"In the beginning, the Azure Sky was vast and boundless, profound and mysterious."*

**Hymn of the Dissolution of the Seat**
*"Attending the Sutra’s Reverberation"*
**Hymn of Wisdom and Benevolence**
*"Turning to the Lower Realm,"*
**Offering Incense and Kneeling in Reverence,**
With utmost devotion, I now present the incense and recite the sutras—
From start to finish, ten full circuits completed.

I humbly pray for blessings and command,
With sincerity in my offering.

I reverently acknowledge the **Supreme Sovereign of the Boundless Lower Realm, the Most Sacred and Precious Heavenly Venerable**,
And the **Boundless Lower Realm’s Flying Celestial Deity-King, the Eternal Great Sage, the Infinite Liberator of Sentient Beings**.

His command encompasses the **Nine Encirclements**,
His light pervades the **Four Quadrants**.

To all **Great and Lesser Officials**,
They must surely receive His proclamation and **broadly disseminate His transformative teachings**;
And to universally liberate **heavenly and human beings**,
None can surpass the merit of **expounding the scriptures**.

I pray He bestow upon me His **final blessings**,
And grant me **pure felicity**.

I write and proclaim His deeds—
Not one record omitted, His **meritorious deeds clearly inscribed**;
Whether **colored or colorless**, none are excluded—
All are equally encompassed by His **unifying and balanced teachings**.

With the **proclamation text** in hand, I now **solemnly declare**:

**Proclamation of the Decree**
*Burning the Offering*

*"Attending the Sutra’s Proclamation,"*
**All praise the scriptural text**—
**Threefold Hearing of the Sutra**
*"The Master’s Hymn of Receipt"*
**Receiving the Sutra with the Dao attained**—
**Universal blessings for heavenly and human beings**.

The **Supreme and Profound Origin**,
With **boundless enlightened grace**.

I vow that **emperors and kings** may **preserve and uphold** their realms,
That **national fortunes** be **secure and tranquil**.

May **eternal joy and great peace** prevail,
And may all **long enjoy serene stillness**.

In unison, I **kneel and take refuge** in the **Boundless Dao**.

The Master **knocks the teeth three times**—thirty-six times in total—
And **kneels in homage to the Ten Directions** before retiring.

Facing east, with **heartfelt reverence**, I **bow three times**,
Closing my eyes, I **recite the secret mantra**:
*"I, [Name], have reverently recited the **Sutra of the Supreme Origin’s Liberating Sentient Beings in the Highest Grade**—
Ten full circuits now completed.

I beseech the **Celestial Dragon Palanquin** to descend,
That the **Heavenly Deities** may descend and manifest,
To command the **Six Celestial Stems**,
That the **Seven Ancestors** may ascend and soar,
And I may ascend to the **Highest Purity**."*

After the mantra concludes, the Master **knocks the teeth three times**,
And **swallows the saliva three times**.

Facing north, with **heartfelt reverence**, I **bow three times**,
Closing my eyes, I **recite the mantra**:
*"The **Supreme Sovereign of Heavenly Truth**,
Command me to ascend to the **Spiritual Realm**.*

With **pure fasting and ritual purification**,
I **recite and chant** the **Sacred Scriptures**.

The **Seven Mysteries** are revealed and dispersed,
I **ascend to the Highest Void** and **attend the Celestial Court**.

May my years be **prolonged** and my life **enduring**,
And may my name be **inscribed in the Record of Merit**."*

After the mantra concludes, the Master **knocks the teeth nine times**,
And **swallows the saliva ten times**.

**Returning the Officials as prescribed**—
Having recited the sutras to completion,
The **Thirty-five Functionaries of the Three and Five**,
The **Left and Right Attendants and Messengers**,
The **Golden Boys of Incense Service**,
The **Jade Girls of Transmission**,
The **Five Emperors of Direct Command and Direct Day Incense Officials**—
Each totaling **thirty-two**—

I now **request their return** into my body,
And **restore them** to their **palaces**.

May the **Mother Command** them to **alternate and intermingle**.
When summoned again, they shall **return as before**.

After the Master **concentrates and returns the Officials**,
He **knocks the teeth three times**,
And **swallows the saliva three times**.

**Making the Vow**—
The **Incense Furnace** is restored as originally.

**Summoning the Celestial Officials**—
The **Immortal Sovereigns and Celestial Officials**,
The **Golden Boys and Jade Girls**,
The **Five Emperors and Five Sacred Mountains’ Immortal Worthies**,
The **Three Qi’s Pure Deities**,
The **Left and Right Dragon-Tiger Lords**,
The **Heavenly and Earthly Immortals**,
The **Five Spirits of Incense Officials**—

I now **command them to summon** the **Rectified Qi of the Ten Directions**,
And naturally **generate** the **Golden Elixir**, **Lapis Lazuli**, **Ginseng, and Holy Fruits**.

The **Hundred Spirits and Multitudes of Worthies**,
Shall **congregate** here,
Before the **Incense Furnace**.

I vow that the **Golden Boys and Jade Girls of the Ten Directions**,
Shall **guard** the **incense smoke**,
And **transmit** the words I have **uttered** as before,
Swiftly reaching the **Supreme Sovereign of the Thirty-Second Heaven**, the **Primordial Emperor of the Highest Dao**, in His **Most Venerable Presence**.

**Before descending the altar**,
I **offer thanks** to the **Divine Kings**.

All the **Celestial Officials**,
I now **solemnly and sincerely** **pray** to the **Ten-Directional Boundless Flight Celestial Kings**, the **Great Saints of Longevity**, the **Infinite Degrees of Humanity**,
The **Ten-Directional Celestial Envoys**,
The **Jade Girls of the Ten Heavens**,
And all **Celestial Officials and Attendants of the Ten Directions**—

May they **behold** the **Great Mercy**,
And **respond** with **Piercing Clarity**.

I have **reverently received** the **Imperial Edicts**,
And **devoutly observed** the **Golden Talismans and Grand Fast**,
**Reciting** the *Supreme Scripture of the Dao/Way’s Mystic Treasures, Infinite Degrees of Humanity, and Highest Perfection* **ten times**,
And **hope** for **Divine Inspection and Verification**—
Fortunately, it has been **completed**.

I now **devoutly present** my **sincere vows**,
And **directly proffer** my **thanks**.

I **humbly reflect** that my **physique** is not **immortal**,
And my **corporeal form** is still **impure**.
To **declare** the **Cloud-Signs and Talismans**,
How could I **grasp** them with my **hands** or **heart**?
To **recite** the **Celestial Scriptures**,
Is merely to **speak** with my **mouth** and **hear** with my **ears**.

My **meditation** is **confused and erroneous**,
And my **chanting** is **hollow and discordant**.
I have **not yet attained** the **Mystic Insight of Piercing Clarity**,
Yet I **first invite** the **faults of carelessness and arrogance**.

I **pray** for **Spring’s Nurturing Grace**,
And **beg** for **Oceanic Tolerance**.
I **knock my teeth three times**,
And **swallow my saliva ten times**—
**Having recited the Talismanic Sutra to completion**,
I **humbly await** Your **Merciful Inspection**.

I **vow** that Your **Sacred Heart** be **broad and encompassing**,
And the **Cosmos** **embrace** the **Great Mercy**.
May You **not exact** the **punishment of the Axe and Cleaver**,
And **instead bestow** the **blessing of the Silk Canopy**.

Thus, the **teachings** shall **radiate** across the **world**,
And the **Dao’s grace** **shine** upon the **land**.

May the **assemblage of devotees** **sincerely** **deliver** this **vow**.

**Returning to the Altar**,
I **bow** before the **Curtain** and **take leave of the Master**.

The **Master** **presents incense** and **performs two prostrations**.

All the **Celestial Officials**,
I **once more** **sincerely** **pray** to the **True Lord of the Mystic Treasures’ Highest Dao**,
The **True Lords of the Mystic Treasures Scripture**, the **Scripture Master**, the **Master of Degrees**,
The **Supreme Lord of the Rectified Dao**,
The **Female, Successor, and System Masters**,
The **True Lord of the Mystic Treasures’ Grand Supervisor of the Fast**,
The **Opener of the Red Diagram** and the **Receptor of the Millet Pearl Transmission**—
The **One Lineage of Teachers**.

I **reverently** **behold** Your **Mercy**,
And **humble myself** in **gratitude**.

I **humbly** **acknowledge** that I have **frequently relied** upon Your **teachings**,
And **broadly proclaimed** Your **precious texts**.
I have **already been enlightened**,
And **fortunate** to **fulfill** the **completion**.

I **reverently approach** Your **steps**,
And **specially express** my **gratitude**.

I have **previously led** the **Celestial Officials**,
And **ascended the altar** to **recite** the *Supreme Scripture of the Dao/Way’s Mystic Treasures, Infinite Degrees of Humanity, and Highest Perfection* **from the Ninth to the Tenth Section**,
And **successfully fulfilled** the **completion**.

I **rely** upon Your **Grace**,
And **achieve** the **good intentions**.

I **directly exhaust** my **humble sincerity**,
And **pay homage** to the **Mystic Hall**.

I **once more reflect** that my **body** has **not yet penetrated** the **True Dao**,
So I **cannot fathom** the **Mystic Profoundness**;
My **learning** has **not reached** the **Dao**,
And I **am ashamed** not to have **attained** the **Pure Void**.

I **humbly pray** for **Great Compassion’s Grace**,
And **beg** for **Mystic Teachers’ Blessings**.
May You **look down** upon the **unworthy disciple**,
And **not condemn** him with **rebuke**.

Thus, my **family and nation** may **benefit** from Your **Grace**,
And **both the living and dead** **gain blessings**.

When **good deeds are perfected**,
The **rankings of merit** shall **take form**.
I **dare** not **violate** Your **strictures**—
My **lowly feelings** are **unutterably** **deep**.
I **gaze** upon the **Heavenly Steps**,
And **bow** with a **devoted heart**.

**Performing the Fast**—
The **Cloud-Carriage**.

**In past observances,**
I **recited** the *Golden Talisman Sutra* ten times,
**conducting** the **Evening Scripture Turning** for **deliverance of beings**,
**following** the **proper ritual etiquette**.

chunks.original_text: 金箓十回度人晚朝转经仪 师堂序立 法事 高功跪启 具位臣，某重伸上启灵宝玄中大法师真君，灵宝经师君、籍师君、度师君，正一天师君，女师嗣师系师君，灵宝监斋大法师真君，赤明开图、黍珠授受一振宗师。 恭望师慈，俯回洞鉴。 臣闻，灵宝本章，总百魔之隐韵； 上品妙首，敷十转之玄功。 兹再演於经科，庸仰干於师造。 臣今入意以今引领官众，升坛转诵《太上洞玄灵宝无量度人上品妙经》第九回至第十回，敬为祝延万寿，保天长存。 全赖师慈，主盟坛席。 庶使响彻三天，声闻九地。

chunks.original_text: 一切有情，同沾利益。 专俟恩命，宣演经科。 臣等干冒师严，下情不胜虔祷之至。 领众升坛，恭行典式。 唱道，引至坛前序立 次第升坛，上香 信礼 各礼师存念如法 玉音摄炁，灵风聚烟。 紫虚郁秀，辅翼万仙。 千和万合，自然成真。 鸣法鼓二十四通 无上玄元太上道君，召出臣等身中三五功曹、左右官使者、侍香金童、传言玉女、五帝直符直日香官，各三十二人出。 关启所言，臣今为某，入意愿得太上降赐十方正真生炁，流注臣等身中，令臣所启，速达径御无上三十二天元始上帝至尊御前。 请称法位 具位臣，某大谢，谨同诚上启太上无极大道虚无自然元始天尊、妙无上帝，玄皇高圣太上玉晨大道君灵宝天尊、妙有上帝，混沌万变玄元老君道德天尊、至真上帝，昊天玉皇上帝，元阳慈父大道君，灵宝玉母大道君，南极天皇上帝、北极紫微大帝、朱陵度命天尊、后土皇地祇、十方无极太上灵宝天尊、已得道大圣众、至真诸君丈人，三十二天帝君、东华南极西灵北真玄都玉京金阙七宝琼台紫微上宫灵宝至真明皇道君，上相上宰、上保上傅、玄中太皇上帝高真，三十六部尊经，玄中大法师，五帝三官、四司九府、日月五星、南辰北斗、二十八宿、璇玑玉衡、列象星真，十方无极至真大神，飞天神王长生无量度人君，天真皇人妙行真人，灵宝三师、监斋大法师、侍经五帝、玉童玉女、典经玉郎、三洞侍经，灵宝官属、三界五帝、大勋魔王，三界官属，应感真灵。 恭望洪慈，俯回洞鉴。 臣闻，空梵成文，虽隐显龙康之劫； 法轮启秘，有弥纶宇宙之功。 顾兹口诵以心惟，谅哉声发而响应。 臣，某倥侗何取，仆遫无庸。 幸因缘运之遭逢，遂窃篇章而紬绎。 属当夜奏，再毕经功。 分阴分阳，考数已穷於奇耦； 彻上彻下，疏恩谅博於高卑。 稽首归依，无极大道。 至心归依，十方经宝，当愿众生，心开悟解，受持读诵。 至心归依，十方道宝，当愿众生，起心回向，一切信礼。 至心归依，十方师宝，当愿众生，普上法桥，无有障碍。 宿命赞 侍经宣，第九回开经科 敷座吟 静念如法

**The Thirty-two Celestial Emperors of the Eastern Marvels, Southern Pole, Western Spirits, and Northern True Purities; the **Supreme Lord of the Golden Gate** and **Seven Treasures** in the **Jade Pivot Palace** of the **Purple Void Upper Court** of the Mystic Treasure, the **Supreme High Official** and **Supreme Grand Vizier**, the **Supreme Protector** and **Supreme Tutor**, the **Supreme High Lord of the Mystic Center**, the **Thirty-six Imperial Scriptures**, the **Supreme Grand Master** of the Mystic Center, the **Five Emperors** and **Three Officials**, the **Four Ministers** and **Nine Departments**, the **Sun, Moon, and Five Stars**, the **Southern Celestial Axis** and **Northern Dipper**, the **Twenty-eight Constellations**, the **Ruler of the **Xuanji** and **Jade Balance**, the **Celestial Immortals of the Stars and Symbols**, the **Ten Directions’ Supreme Saints of the Dao/Way**, the **Long-Lived, Boundless Degree of Salvation Lord of the Flying Celestial Ones**, the **Celestial Man of the Dao/Way** and the **Miraculous True Person of the Way**, the **Three Mystic Treasures**, the **Supreme Master of the Ritual Fast**, the **Five Emperors Attending the Scriptures**, the **Jade Boys and Jade Girls**, the **Jade Gentleman of the Scriptures**, the **Three Dao/Way Attendants of the Scriptures**, the **Mystic Treasure Officials**, the **Five Emperors of the Three Realms**, the **Great Magical King**, the **Three Realms’ Officials**, and all the **Responsive True Spirits**—**

We humbly gaze upon Your **Great Benevolence**, awaiting Your **Divine Discernment**. We have heard that the **emptiness and dharma** coalesce into sacred texts, though they transcend the **hidden and revealed** cycles of the **Dragon-Kang Effort***; and the **law-wheel** reveals its mysteries, encompassing the **universal harmonizing** of all existence.

Now, as we recite with our mouths and contemplate with our hearts, Your mercy surely extends to every utterance and response.

We, Your humble servants, **某** (name), are unworthy and insignificant. Yet, by the fortunate encounter of **karmic circumstances**, we have seized this opportunity to expound the scriptures.

On this auspicious night, we complete the **ritual cycles** once more. The division of **yin** and **yang**, the reckoning of numbers, has reached its fullness in the **odd and even pairs**; the **high and low**, the **vast and profound**, have been thoroughly illuminated by Your **Benevolent Grace**.

With deepest reverence, we prostrate ourselves and take refuge in the **Supreme Dao/Way of the Boundless**. With utmost sincerity, we take refuge in the **Ten Directions’ Scriptural Treasures**, praying that all beings may open their hearts to enlightenment and uphold, recite, and study these teachings.

With utmost sincerity, we take refuge in the **Ten Directions’ Dao/Way Treasures**, praying that all beings may turn their minds to **devotion** and render **sincere homage** to all.

With utmost sincerity, we take refuge in the **Ten Directions’ Master Treasures**, praying that all beings may ascend the **law-path** universally, encountering no obstacles.

chunks.original_text: 道言，昔於始青天中云云大量玄玄也。 解座吟 侍经回向 智惠颂 旋至下方，上香再拜 臣恭以行香诵经，始终十徧。 祈恩请命，表裹一诚。 恭惟下方无极太上灵宝天尊，下方无极飞天神王长生大圣无量度人君。 命式九围，光被四表。 惟总御大小，必承宣道化以旁周； 而普度天人，非推广经功而莫可。 伏愿锡之终惠，介以纯禧。 大书特书不一书，明标功籍； 有色无色非有色，均囿化钧。 具有表文，谨当宣告 宣表关 焚化 侍经宣，普叹经文 三闻经 师收经赞 收经得道，普福天人。 无上玄元，无边睿泽。 当愿帝王保镇，国祚安宁。 永乐太平，长享清静。 和稽首归依，无极大道。 师叩齿三十六通，心拜十方而退。 东向，心礼三拜，瞑目密咒曰：臣，某谨诵《元始度人上品妙经》十徧既周。 乞发龙軿，天神下降，役使六甲，七祖飞升，我腾上清。 咒毕，叩齿三通，咽液三过。 北向，心礼三拜，瞑目咒曰：上皇天真，使我升灵。 清斋澡炼，诵咏灵书。 七玄披散，上朝太虚。 延年长存，刻名录书。 咒毕，叩齿九通，咽液十过。 纳官如法 臣诵经已竟，向来所出臣身中三五功曹、左右官使者、侍香金童、传言玉女、五帝直符直日香官，各三十二人。 请还入臣等身中，复於宫室。 母令差互。 后召又到，一如故事。 师精思还宫毕，叩齿三通，咽液三过。 发愿 复炉如故
chunks.translated_text:
The Dao speaks: *"In the beginning, the Azure Sky was vast and boundless, profound and mysterious."*

**Hymn of the Dissolution of the Seat**
*"Attending the Sutra’s Reverberation"*
**Hymn of Wisdom and Benevolence**
*"Turning to the Lower Realm,"*
**Offering Incense and Kneeling in Reverence,**
With utmost devotion, I now present the incense and recite the sutras—
From start to finish, ten full circuits completed.

I humbly pray for blessings and command,
With sincerity in my offering.

I reverently acknowledge the **Supreme Sovereign of the Boundless Lower Realm, the Most Sacred and Precious Heavenly Venerable**,
And the **Boundless Lower Realm’s Flying Celestial Deity-King, the Eternal Great Sage, the Infinite Liberator of Sentient Beings**.

His command encompasses the **Nine Encirclements**,
His light pervades the **Four Quadrants**.

To all **Great and Lesser Officials**,
They must surely receive His proclamation and **broadly disseminate His transformative teachings**;
And to universally liberate **heavenly and human beings**,
None can surpass the merit of **expounding the scriptures**.

I pray He bestow upon me His **final blessings**,
And grant me **pure felicity**.

I write and proclaim His deeds—
Not one record omitted, His **meritorious deeds clearly inscribed**;
Whether **colored or colorless**, none are excluded—
All are equally encompassed by His **unifying and balanced teachings**.

With the **proclamation text** in hand, I now **solemnly declare**:

**Proclamation of the Decree**
*Burning the Offering*

*"Attending the Sutra’s Proclamation,"*
**All praise the scriptural text**—
**Threefold Hearing of the Sutra**
*"The Master’s Hymn of Receipt"*
**Receiving the Sutra with the Dao attained**—
**Universal blessings for heavenly and human beings**.

The **Supreme and Profound Origin**,
With **boundless enlightened grace**.

I vow that **emperors and kings** may **preserve and uphold** their realms,
That **national fortunes** be **secure and tranquil**.

May **eternal joy and great peace** prevail,
And may all **long enjoy serene stillness**.

In unison, I **kneel and take refuge** in the **Boundless Dao**.

The Master **knocks the teeth three times**—thirty-six times in total—
And **kneels in homage to the Ten Directions** before retiring.

Facing east, with **heartfelt reverence**, I **bow three times**,
Closing my eyes, I **recite the secret mantra**:
*"I, [Name], have reverently recited the **Sutra of the Supreme Origin’s Liberating Sentient Beings in the Highest Grade**—
Ten full circuits now completed.

I beseech the **Celestial Dragon Palanquin** to descend,
That the **Heavenly Deities** may descend and manifest,
To command the **Six Celestial Stems**,
That the **Seven Ancestors** may ascend and soar,
And I may ascend to the **Highest Purity**."*

After the mantra concludes, the Master **knocks the teeth three times**,
And **swallows the saliva three times**.

Facing north, with **heartfelt reverence**, I **bow three times**,
Closing my eyes, I **recite the mantra**:
*"The **Supreme Sovereign of Heavenly Truth**,
Command me to ascend to the **Spiritual Realm**.*

With **pure fasting and ritual purification**,
I **recite and chant** the **Sacred Scriptures**.

The **Seven Mysteries** are revealed and dispersed,
I **ascend to the Highest Void** and **attend the Celestial Court**.

May my years be **prolonged** and my life **enduring**,
And may my name be **inscribed in the Record of Merit**."*

After the mantra concludes, the Master **knocks the teeth nine times**,
And **swallows the saliva ten times**.

**Returning the Officials as prescribed**—
Having recited the sutras to completion,
The **Thirty-five Functionaries of the Three and Five**,
The **Left and Right Attendants and Messengers**,
The **Golden Boys of Incense Service**,
The **Jade Girls of Transmission**,
The **Five Emperors of Direct Command and Direct Day Incense Officials**—
Each totaling **thirty-two**—

I now **request their return** into my body,
And **restore them** to their **palaces**.

May the **Mother Command** them to **alternate and intermingle**.
When summoned again, they shall **return as before**.

After the Master **concentrates and returns the Officials**,
He **knocks the teeth three times**,
And **swallows the saliva three times**.

**Making the Vow**—
The **Incense Furnace** is restored as originally.

chunks.original_text: 仙灵仙官、金童玉女、五帝五岳神仙真人、三炁正神、左右龙虎君、天仙地仙、五灵香官，当令召致十方正炁，自然生金液丹碧芝英。 百灵众真，交会在此，香火炉前。 当愿十方仙童玉女，侍卫香烟，传臣向来所启之言，速达径御无上三十二天元始上帝至尊御前。 下坛前，谢神王 具位臣，某谨重诚上启十方无极飞天神王长生大圣无量度人君，十方飞天使者，十天玉女，十方一切神仙官属。 咸望洪慈，洞回昭鉴。 向来钦奉纶音，崇修金箓大斋，转诵《太上洞玄灵宝无量度人上品妙经》十徧，仰勤鉴证，幸已周圆。 谨竭丹诚，径伸谒谢。 伏念某等骨相非仙，血尸尚秽。 宣行云篆，岂能应之手，得之心； 讽诵天书，不过出乎口、入乎耳。 存思迷谬，音响□呶。 未能致冥慧洞清之天，而先招轻泄漏慢之过。 仰祈春育，曲赐海涵。 叩谢疏文，谨当宣读。 宣疏 疏文宣竟，谅赐鉴观。 伏愿圣心宽绰，宇宙含洪。 不加斧钺之诛，曲赐帡蒙之造。 使经教昭布乎寰宇，而道恩光被于邦家。 法众虔诚，谨当奉送。 直坛引下坛，诣幕谢师 师上香再拜 具位臣，某重伸上启灵宝玄中大法师真君，灵宝经师君、籍师君、度师君，正一天师君，女师嗣师系师君，灵宝监斋大法师真君，赤明开图、黍珠授受一派宗师。 恭望师慈，俯观谢悃。 伏以屡控师垣，宏宣宝笈。 已蒙开悟，幸遂周圆。 恭诣师阶，特摅谢悃。 臣向来引领官众，升坛转咏《太上洞玄灵宝无量度人上品妙经》第九回至第十回，已遂周圆。 仰荷师恩，克成善念。 径殚愚悃，谒谢玄堂。 重念某体未洞真，故莫穷於玄奥； 学不至道，愧未造於清虚。 伏望大造垂恩，玄师锡庆。 俯怜末学，不赐谴诃。 庶俾家国沾恩，存亡获福。 善功圆满，品汇生成。 干冒师严，臣等下情不胜攀恋之至。 瞻仰天阶，倾心拜送。 修斋 云舆
chunks.translated_text:
**Summoning the Celestial Officials**—
The **Immortal Sovereigns and Celestial Officials**,
The **Golden Boys and Jade Girls**,
The **Five Emperors and Five Sacred Mountains’ Immortal Worthies**,
The **Three Qi’s Pure Deities**,
The **Left and Right Dragon-Tiger Lords**,
The **Heavenly and Earthly Immortals**,
The **Five Spirits of Incense Officials**—

I now **command them to summon** the **Rectified Qi of the Ten Directions**,
And naturally **generate** the **Golden Elixir**, **Lapis Lazuli**, **Ginseng, and Holy Fruits**.

The **Hundred Spirits and Multitudes of Worthies**,
Shall **congregate** here,
Before the **Incense Furnace**.

I vow that the **Golden Boys and Jade Girls of the Ten Directions**,
Shall **guard** the **incense smoke**,
And **transmit** the words I have **uttered** as before,
Swiftly reaching the **Supreme Sovereign of the Thirty-Second Heaven**, the **Primordial Emperor of the Highest Dao**, in His **Most Venerable Presence**.

**Before descending the altar**,
I **offer thanks** to the **Divine Kings**.

All the **Celestial Officials**,
I now **solemnly and sincerely** **pray** to the **Ten-Directional Boundless Flight Celestial Kings**, the **Great Saints of Longevity**, the **Infinite Degrees of Humanity**,
The **Ten-Directional Celestial Envoys**,
The **Jade Girls of the Ten Heavens**,
And all **Celestial Officials and Attendants of the Ten Directions**—

May they **behold** the **Great Mercy**,
And **respond** with **Piercing Clarity**.

I have **reverently received** the **Imperial Edicts**,
And **devoutly observed** the **Golden Talismans and Grand Fast**,
**Reciting** the *Supreme Scripture of the Dao/Way’s Mystic Treasures, Infinite Degrees of Humanity, and Highest Perfection* **ten times**,
And **hope** for **Divine Inspection and Verification**—
Fortunately, it has been **completed**.

I now **devoutly present** my **sincere vows**,
And **directly proffer** my **thanks**.

I **humbly reflect** that my **physique** is not **immortal**,
And my **corporeal form** is still **impure**.
To **declare** the **Cloud-Signs and Talismans**,
How could I **grasp** them with my **hands** or **heart**?
To **recite** the **Celestial Scriptures**,
Is merely to **speak** with my **mouth** and **hear** with my **ears**.

My **meditation** is **confused and erroneous**,
And my **chanting** is **hollow and discordant**.
I have **not yet attained** the **Mystic Insight of Piercing Clarity**,
Yet I **first invite** the **faults of carelessness and arrogance**.

I **pray** for **Spring’s Nurturing Grace**,
And **beg** for **Oceanic Tolerance**.
I **knock my teeth three times**,
And **swallow my saliva ten times**—
**Having recited the Talismanic Sutra to completion**,
I **humbly await** Your **Merciful Inspection**.

I **vow** that Your **Sacred Heart** be **broad and encompassing**,
And the **Cosmos** **embrace** the **Great Mercy**.
May You **not exact** the **punishment of the Axe and Cleaver**,
And **instead bestow** the **blessing of the Silk Canopy**.

Thus, the **teachings** shall **radiate** across the **world**,
And the **Dao’s grace** **shine** upon the **land**.

May the **assemblage of devotees** **sincerely** **deliver** this **vow**.

**Returning to the Altar**,
I **bow** before the **Curtain** and **take leave of the Master**.

The **Master** **presents incense** and **performs two prostrations**.

All the **Celestial Officials**,
I **once more** **sincerely** **pray** to the **True Lord of the Mystic Treasures’ Highest Dao**,
The **True Lords of the Mystic Treasures Scripture**, the **Scripture Master**, the **Master of Degrees**,
The **Supreme Lord of the Rectified Dao**,
The **Female, Successor, and System Masters**,
The **True Lord of the Mystic Treasures’ Grand Supervisor of the Fast**,
The **Opener of the Red Diagram** and the **Receptor of the Millet Pearl Transmission**—
The **One Lineage of Teachers**.

I **reverently** **behold** Your **Mercy**,
And **humble myself** in **gratitude**.

I **humbly** **acknowledge** that I have **frequently relied** upon Your **teachings**,
And **broadly proclaimed** Your **precious texts**.
I have **already been enlightened**,
And **fortunate** to **fulfill** the **completion**.

I **reverently approach** Your **steps**,
And **specially express** my **gratitude**.

I have **previously led** the **Celestial Officials**,
And **ascended the altar** to **recite** the *Supreme Scripture of the Dao/Way’s Mystic Treasures, Infinite Degrees of Humanity, and Highest Perfection* **from the Ninth to the Tenth Section**,
And **successfully fulfilled** the **completion**.

I **rely** upon Your **Grace**,
And **achieve** the **good intentions**.

I **directly exhaust** my **humble sincerity**,
And **pay homage** to the **Mystic Hall**.

I **once more reflect** that my **body** has **not yet penetrated** the **True Dao**,
So I **cannot fathom** the **Mystic Profoundness**;
My **learning** has **not reached** the **Dao**,
And I **am ashamed** not to have **attained** the **Pure Void**.

I **humbly pray** for **Great Compassion’s Grace**,
And **beg** for **Mystic Teachers’ Blessings**.
May You **look down** upon the **unworthy disciple**,
And **not condemn** him with **rebuke**.

Thus, my **family and nation** may **benefit** from Your **Grace**,
And **both the living and dead** **gain blessings**.

When **good deeds are perfected**,
The **rankings of merit** shall **take form**.
I **dare** not **violate** Your **strictures**—
My **lowly feelings** are **unutterably** **deep**.
I **gaze** upon the **Heavenly Steps**,
And **bow** with a **devoted heart**.

**Performing the Fast**—
The **Cloud-Carriage**.
